item.title: Low cost topic classification
item.description: I implemented an algorithm based on a research paper and developed a streamlit app on top of it. The algorithm performs topic classifcation based on the idea of a compression algorithm, a distance metric and also KNN algorithm. Here is the link to the app: https://low-cost-classification.streamlit.app/ Feel free to use it!

item.title: Statistical drift detection
item.description: I developed an app to detect covariate drift based on simple statistical methods. The app is up on streamlit cloud: https://statistical-data-drift-detection.streamlit.app/ Feel free to try it!

item.title: About me
item.description: Hello! Welcome to my site. My name is Albert Wibowo. I am a machine learning scientist with engineering and MLOps experience. I graduated from the University of Edinburgh with Economics and Statistics degree. I have been working as a machine learning scientist for a few years, starting my journey in a consultancy before moving to a scale-up tech company. My passion lies in developing ML based products. I will use this site as a platform to share my hobby projects which I hope can be informative.

item.title: My posts
item.description: Hello, I write all of my articles on Medium. So please proceed to my Medium profile: https://albert14wibowo.medium.com/
